title: Linux diff3 Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the diff3 command in Linux, learn how to merge conflicting files, and resolve conflicts in a three-way merge with practical examples.

meta.title: Linux diff3 Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the diff3 command in Linux, learn how to merge conflicting files, and resolve conflicts in a three-way merge with practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, diff3, merge, conflict, three-way merge, scripting, programming

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of diff3 Command

verify.name: Verify the purpose of diff3 command
verify.hint: The diff3 command is used to compare three files and identify the differences between them. Please review the output of the `diff3 --help` command to verify its purpose.

verify.name: Verify the use of diff3 for merging conflicting files
verify.hint: The diff3 command should be used to merge the conflicting changes in the three files. Please verify that the merged output contains the desired changes.

steps.title: Resolve Conflicts in a Three-Way Merge

verify.name: Verify the resolution of conflicts in the three-way merge
verify.hint: The diff3 command should be used to resolve the conflicts in the three-way merge. Please verify that the merged output contains the desired changes.
